concept.title: Working with Tables
concept.shortdesc: Tables can add value to a document by representing content in columns and rows, and provide a structure for some types of information.

conbody.p: You may have detailed information that is best detailed in a table that outlines information with main headers and related details in the body of the table. This structure allows content to be organized and provides a quick lookup for readers to scan and find important information.
